data.name: Sphere.it
data.description: A unique & innovative Software Tech Conference. Attracting developers, technology enthusiasts and businesses people all over the globe, Sphere.it Conference is becoming the leading Software Tech event in Poland, with around 1000 participants, great workshops and world class speakers.
